urceforge.net/javadoc_40/org/junit/runner/manipulation/Sorter.html, but it =
really doesn't explain how to use it.  I don't see any annotations, and I d=
on't know what's the best practice to extend Suite and set the comparator.
=

How do I use sorter so I can run testA() testC() and testB() in that order=
?
